titleStmt.title: The last speech, and confession of the whore of Babylon, at her place of execution, on the fifth of November last whereunto is added, the famous story of the Bell, used by the Irish papists, taken out of the Bishop of Down and Conner's epistle to his perswasive against popery.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, Jeremy, 1613-1667. Dissuasive from popery.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in British Library.
